page.title: 14GAMES IN SCHOOL continued
page.content: favourite{playground game}?"there were a few popular games and there were a few unusual games.The most popular game was{"chasy",}49 people voted for it.The second most popular game was {"french skipping",}and 37 people voted for it. Some of the more unusual games were jacks and skipping.Only one person voted for these games. {FRENCH SKIPPING Two people stand at each end of an elastic band which is about three metres long.One person stands in the middle and jumps from one side to the other inside and out saying rhymes. {JACKS.}Jacks is a game where you use a power ball and some pieces of metal jacks that are in a cross shapes.You bounce the power ball and pick up the pieces of metal then try to catch the power ball. The Jacks must be picked up in a particular order.
